description: This file contains the main entry point and the primary widget structure for a Flutter mobile application. It defines a stateless app widget and a stateful home page widget with a basic user interface displaying a message and progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: A stateless widget that sets up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the main screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: The state class managing the UI for MyHomePage, displaying a message and a progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The application's entry point, which runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
